channel.title: First Android Game - Thoughts and Feedback
channel.description:
Welcome to my thread about my first Android application. Creation of this application and was used strictly for learning purposes; to get comfortable with some Android application development as well as strengthen my knowledge in Java.
If you have any suggestions for me, feedback, or maybe even something you'd like to see, just leave a comment on either this post or the play store! Can't wait to hear back from the community!
[img height=50 width=50]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/xtjYatmSRqhq6vSSsuIEewEzObmRYIcRNgyd2-oGBdslIVTzJ9SGIjnOfio2DDpwdA=w300-rw[/img]
Application(s) can be found here: [url=https://play.google.com/store/search?q=sabinocode]Square Droid - Google Playstore[/url]
Or Search "SabinoCode" on The Play Store and click SquareDroid: [url=https://play.google.com/store/search?q=sabinocode]Search for SabinoCode - Google Playstore[/url]

item.title: First Android Game - Thoughts and Feedback

item.description:
@Sabinocode wrote:

Welcome to my thread about my first Android application. Creation of this application and was used strictly for learning purposes; to get comfortable with some Android application development as well as strengthen my knowledge in Java.

If you have any suggestions for me, feedback, or maybe even something you’d like to see, just leave a comment on either this post or the play store! Can’t wait to hear back from the community!

Application(s) can be found here: Square Droid - Google Playstore

Or Search “SabinoCode” on The Play Store and click SquareDroid: Search for SabinoCode - Google Playstore
